CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 25, 1957, pg. A17 reads: "Escorts...for the 1957 debutantes included, seated, Charles Hampton, Donald Jones, Joseph W. Lee, Earl Harris, Vernon Reynolds, Obadiah Simms, Kermit Matthews. Standing are Roy Bennett, James Fletcher, Donald Moss, Walter Smith, Garfield Ralph, Bloise Avery, William Hampton, Kenneth Holiday, Farris Harris and Robert Sabbath. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight young men wearing tuxedos, including possibly from left, seated: Charles Hampton, Donald Jones, Joseph W. Lee, and Earl Harris; standing: Roy Bennett, James Fletcher, Donald Moss, and Walter Smith, posed in Penn Sheraton Hotel for the Alpha Kappa Alpha 1957 Cotillion
